element.short: Upper limit on medication per unit of time
element.definition: The maximum total quantity of a therapeutic substance that may be administered to a subject over the period of time.  For example, 1000mg in 24 hours.
element.comments: This is intended for use as an adjunct to the dosage when there is an upper cap.  For example "2 tablets every 4 hours to a maximum of 8/day".
